item.title: Ray Charles dead at 73
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: "'His sound was stunning -- it was the blues, it was R&B, it was gospel, it was swing -- it was all the stuff I was listening to before that but rolled into one amazing, soulful thing,' singer Van Morrison told Rolling Stone magazine in April." Full article
item.excerpt:encoded: "'His sound was stunning -- it was the blues, it was R&B, it was gospel, it was swing -- it was all the stuff I was listening to before that but rolled into one amazing, soulful thing,' singer Van Morrison told Rolling Stone magazine in April." Fu...
